entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:29 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:25 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 09:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -10.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow early this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
